p: Furthermore, in animal feeding, EOs have roles as hypolipidemic and immune-modulating agents, as well as heat stress alleviators. Moreover, they are used as agents to reduce the methanogenesis rate [ 98]. Antioxidant properties of PFA and EOs have been positively correlated with egg and meat stability in storage conditions due to their ability to reduce lipid oxidation [ 2]. Research data have been reported on the PFA impact on egg and meat production parameters ( Table 1), however, the data are discrepant and difficult to fully comprehend [ 99].
